block.name: VCO
block.doc: Implements a voltage-controlled oscillator. The output frequency is linearly proportional to the input voltage multiplied by the Sensitivity.

param.name: Sample Rate
param.doc: Sets the sample rate for the VCO. For most purposes this can be set to the sample rate variable samp_rate

param.name: Sensitivity
param.doc: Sets the scaling constant for the VCO. Note that the units are rad/sec*V, not Hz/V.

param.name: Amplitude
param.doc: Sets the output amplitude for the VCO.
